name: Jade Parcels
effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 224-320 and CRIT Rate by 6-10% for 300s.
description: An exquisite-looking dish. The ham's sweetness is locked inside the fresh vegetables, drizzled with a spicy broth. Delicious is an understatement.
source: Obtained from "Cooking Showdown" (Xiangling's Story Quest, AR15+)
